A01: 201 Master-positioning sensor does not go ON even after the write pulse motor is activated during the master-positioning, master-cut, or master-loading operation. 258 Master end tape detected twice in a row.
Open the master-making unit and rewind the master material on the master roll, and then reset the master, or turn OFF the power and power back ON.
Pull out the print cylinder and set it back.

Pull out the print drum and push it back in.

304 Master disposal box check request after master removal error or master disposal jam. 312 Master disposal jam sensor was ON at the start of the master making.

Waiting for the master to be removed from the drum
525 Waiting for the master to be removed from the print cylinder (drum).
Pull out the print cylinder (drum), remove the master around it and insert it back.

205 Master positioning sensor is ON after master cutting and Print drum returns back to Position-A. (Master cut error) 209 Cutter HP switch is OFF when master making started or when the master material was set.
Open the Master making unit, remove the master and close the master making unit.
Requesting for the master to be reset

206 When the Master making unit safety switch turned from OFF to ON, the Master position sensor was ON. (Master setting error) 218 Requesting for the leading edge of the master material to be set in the master making unit.
Open the Master making unit, re-insert the master material into the master making unit.

512 The ink sensor did not go ON even when inking was performed for a preset duration. (No ink detected.) 563 Ink remaining amount is zero from the information on the RF-Tag. 574 Inkless error was detected 5 times consecutively on one same ink cartridge.
Remove the empty ink cartridge and replace with a new one.

200 The master end was detected twice in succession at 10-milliseconds intervals during master transport. (Master material is fully used from the master roll.) 240 Master remaining amount is zero from the RF-Tag information. 253 Masterless error was detected twice consecutively on one same master-roll.
Remove the empty master roll and replace with a new one.
311 The master disposal software counter counted maximum. (Master disposal box full by the software count.)
Remove master disposal box from the machine, throw away the disposed master from the disposal box and return the disposal box in the machine after an interval of over 5 seconds.

526 Print drum is not set in the machine (drum connection signal, drum safety switch, and drum set sensor are OFF.) 527 Print drum connection signal is OFF when the print drum was inserted in the machine. 528 Print drum safety switch is OFF when the print drum was inserted in the machine.
Set the print drum in the machine.
533 Ink bottle set switch is OFF.
Install ink cartridge in the print drum.

534 Incorrect ink cartridge is used. 560 Ink RF-Tag is not detected on ink bottle. 561 Ink RF-Tag communication error (communication with the ink cartridge was interfered by noise). 562 Incorrect information on the Ink RF-Tag. 564 Detected a mismatch in the Ink RF-Tag serial number. 575 RF-Tag software error.
Insert leading edge of the master material into the master entrance and close the master making unit.
4 27 Paper separation unit safety switch is OFF.
Set the Paper separation unit in place so the sfety switch is pressed.
310 Master disposal box set sensor is OFF.
Set master disposal box in the machine.
224 Master making unit is opened. (Master making unit safety switch is OFF).
Set the Master making unit in place.
314 Master removal safety switch is OFF.
Set the Master removal unit in place.

529 Print drum set sensor stays OFF even after the print drum set signal and print drum safety switch went ON. 530 Either the print drum set signal or print drum safety switch is OFF while the other is ON. (Print drum not fully inserted in position.)
Insert the Print drum firmly in the machine.

236 Incorrect master roll. 238 Master roll RF-Tag communication error. (Communication interrupted by noise) 239 Incorrect information on the Master roll RF-Tag. 241 Mismatch in the Master roll RF-Tag serial number information. 256 Master roll RF-Tag software error.
Set correct master roll in the machine.
015 There is no master on the print drum at the start of printing.
Make a new master with an original.

019 In master making, the print quantity selected is less than the minimum print quantity.
Enter print quantity value over the programmed minimum value.

H4-242 Select the master sensitivity parameter.
